import React, { useState, useCallback } from 'react'; import './InvitationCard.css'; import RSVPForm from './RSVPForm'; const InvitationCard: React.FC = () => { const [showRSVP, setShowRSVP] = useState(false); const handleRSVPClick = useCallback(() => { setShowRSVP(!showRSVP); }, [showRSVP]); return (

You're Invited!

Harry Potter Halloween Party

📅 Date: October 31st, 2024
🕰️ Time: 7:00 PM - Midnight
🏰 Location: 123 Diagon Alley, Hogsmeade
👻 Dress Code: Wizarding World Costumes Encouraged!

Join us for a magical evening filled with:

  • ✨ Potion-making station
  • 🎃 Pumpkin carving contest
  • 🍺 Butterbeer tasting
  • 🎭 Costume contest with prizes
  • 🎵 Magical music and dancing
  • 🍰 Enchanted treats and cauldron cakes
{/* RSVP Form Overlay */} {showRSVP && (
setShowRSVP(false)} />
)}
); }; export default InvitationCard;
